ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Prowls orders are cut off as a series of blasts hit his wing. Lunarpine couldn t see the bot shouting orders to him. but he still had a commitment to follow

Prowls orders are cut off as a series of blasts hit his wing. 
Lunarpine couldn't see the bot shouting orders to him. but he still 
had a commitment to follow orders. Then again Prowl never completed 
the order so the wolfbot wasn't inclined to follow them. He followed 
Prowls scent hoping to catch the odor of his attacker.

"Prowl are you functional?" his answer came from the sound of a 
pellet launcher firing from the location of Prowls scent.Both Shadow 
Wing and Prowl were functional, that was all that mattered at this 
moment.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Yes, Unitron is a Newcomer, but Prowl isn't a Predacon, Inferno.
> 
> ::Prowl/Zeus::
> 
> Prowl grins at Lunarpine, "No can do, you're getting in a CR 
chamber whether 
> you like it or n-"
> 
> Shots from Unitron dig into the base of his wing, sending Prowl 
crashing down 
> to the ground. Prowl sits up, firing an acid pellet at Unitron.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zeus opens his eyes. He was in severe pain, complete with nearly-
critical 
> damage done to his systems from the crash. He crawls slowly toward 
Shuko.
> 
> "Sir," he coughs out, "I suggest we make a tactical withdrawl. 
Without Ra, we 
> cannot form Dark Messiah."
